Package pgrid.network.protocol

Interface Summary
PGridMessage This class represents a interface for all Gridella messages.
RoutableMessage Class description goes here
 

Class Summary
ACKMessage This class represents a P-Grid acknolegment message.
BootstrapMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap message.
BootstrapReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap reply message.
ChallengeMessage This class represents a P-Grid challenge message.
ChallengeReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid challenge response message.
DataModifierMessage This class represents a data modifier message.
ExchangeInvitationMessage This class represents a P-Grid exchange invitation.
ExchangeMessage This class represents a Gridella exchange message.
ExchangeReplyMessage This class represents an exchange reply message.
GenericMessage This class represents a P-Grid generic message to be used with the P2P interface.
InitMessage This class represents a P-Grid init message.
InitResponseMessage This class represents a Gridella init response message.
MessageHeader This class represents a Gridella query message.
PeerLookupMessage This class represents a P-Grid peer query message.
PeerLookupReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid peer query message.
QueryMessage This class represents a Gridella query message.
QueryReplyMessage This class represents a query reply.
RangeQueryMessage This class represents a Gridella range query message.
ReplicateMessage This class represents a Gridella replica message.
SearchPathMessage This class represents a P-Grid message.
SearchPathReplyMessage This class represents a search path reply message.
XMLDataTable This class extends the DataTable with XML functionality.
XMLPGridHost This class extends the PGridHost with XML functionality.
